::DrillBit::

DrillBit jumped away from the ships blast. It was hard not to notice it.
He turns to shoot at Zava again, but Enfectra's missile strikes near
him, throwing him back. He gets back to his feet. He sees Deemos, over
Land Mine's body.
"Get away from her..., NOW!" He yells, shooting two optic blasts, six
insect leg machine guns, and a gattaling gun, at Deemos.

::K9::

K9 returns to the CF, and fines it under attack.(He is behind the
attackers.)
"K9, MAXIMIZE!" He transformes to bot mode, and shoots a plasma charge
at all three attackers.
